original_text: People eat whatever food they can get, on their right side or their left side. But they are still hungry. They even eat their own family!
korean_text: 오른쪽으로 움킬지라도 주리고 왼쪽으로 먹을지라도 배부르지 못하여 각각 자기 팔의 고기를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: People eat whatever food they can get
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 얻을 수 있는 어떤 음식이든 먹는다

sentences.original_text: on their right side or their left side
They even eat their own family
